select-wallet.title: Sign In
select-wallet.description: Choose one of available wallet providers or create a new wallet.

faq.title: What is a wallet?
faq.text: Wallets are used to send, receive, and store digital assets like Ether. Wallets come in many forms. They are either built into your browser, an extension added to your browser, a piece of hardware plugged into your computer or even an app on your phone. For more information about wallets,

errors.signature: Error signing message. Please try again or contact support if it doesn't work.
